name: Escape Legacy 3D - Adventure
description:
You take command of Erica, an archeologist who follows the adventurous steps of her grandfather. Your task is to find, collect and reveil the secrets of those ancient scrolls.
Explore all escape rooms, solve puzzles, find items before time run's out and compete with players from all over the world.


FEATURES

- Fully Animated True First Person Character
- Puzzles and Items Change Every Time you Play
- Amazing Console like Game Graphics
- Play in Touch Mode or TV Mode
- Use Airplay on TV and play with Gamepad(for inGame)
- 10 Levels with 80+ Rooms to explore
- Over 10 Hours of Gameplay
- Challenging Puzzles
- Thrilling Music and Sound Effects
- Player Interactive Gaming Enviroment
- Intelligent Inventory System
- Unique Scoring system with Global Scoreboards
- Supports MFI GamePads(for inGame)


Please Note that a network connection is also required for submitting your scores.

Game Progress is stored Localy, please backup before uninstalling.

This App contains a Free version where player can access one level. To explore all 10
levels player has to buy the Full Version (in-app purchase)

Thank you for choosing to Play Escape Legacy!
